original_title: Emma: A New Jane Austen Musical
overview: Emma, a timeless love story from one of the most widely read writers of all time, is a musical that will entice modern audiences to fall in love again with one of Jane Austen's most adored characters. Paul Gordon's critically acclaimed stage adaptation re-imagines the Austen's classic in mid-century modern yet keeps the language intact.
tagline: Without music, life would be a blank to me.
title: Emma: A New Jane Austen Musical
